body: for the love of the gods someone pick up this serie..

Might as well save you some time: artist (in the upcoming chapters) dicks around with foreshadowing ntr+rape. Then we get an introduction to some asshole kids who rape some woman later. Some undesirable stuff happens, one of which is the dad getting it on with the mom and then you see the mom getting mmf'd (once in a dream, the second idk since moonrune and the context was a little vague but you should probably assume the worst).  If it makes you feel any better, the last couple pages looked kinda happy, I guess.
